name: Microphone
description: A microphone is a transducer that converts sound into an electrical signal.

name: Guitar
description: A guitar is a fretted musical instrument that typically has six strings.

name: Electric Guitar
description: An electric guitar is a guitar that requires external amplification in order to be heard at typical performance volumes.

name: Piano
description: A piano is a stringed keyboard instrument in which the strings are struck by wooden hammers that are coated with a softer material.

name: Electric Piano
description: An electric piano is a musical instrument which produces sounds when a performer presses the keys of a piano-style musical keyboard.

name: Synthesizer
description: A synthesizer is an electronic musical instrument that generates audio signals.

name: Accodion
description: An Accordion is a family of box-shaped musical instruments of the bellows-driven free-reed aerophone type, colloquially referred to as a squeezebox.

name: Violin
description: A violin is a wooden chordophone and the smallest and thus highest-pitched instrument in the violin family.

name: Bass Guitar
description: A bass guitar is the lowest-pitched member of the guitar family which is a plucked string instrument similar in appearance and construction to a guitar.

name: Drums
description: A Drum Kit is a collection of drums, cymbals and other percussion instruments, which are set up on stands to be played by a single player.
